name: San Diego

authority.name: San Diego Parking Administration
authority.authority_name: City of San Diego, Parking Administration
authority.serves_description: Parking citations issued by the City of San Diego for general parking enforcement.

citation_pattern.notes: City parking citations typically show a numeric citation number; length may vary.

submission_methods.notes: Administrative review requests may be filed online or by mail.

phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm this is the correct Phase-1 mailing address for City of San Diego parking citations.

verification.source_note: Mailing address and instructions from City of San Diego official site:contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}.

official_confirmation_purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.
qa_blocking_issues: University of San Diego and SDSU sections lack confirmed mailing addresses for Phase-1 appeals; both require confirmation of online-only or in-person procedures.
qa_known_gaps: Citation number patterns across authorities are based on limited information and have low confidence.
SDSU and USD sections require follow-up phone confirmation to verify appeal routing and absence of mailing addresses.
